title: Scotch eggs with mustard sauce
ingredients: ['1 egg', '225g mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons prepared mustard', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '6 eggs', '2L oil for deep frying', '350g pork sausage, casings removed and chopped', '1 tablespoon dried parsley, crushed', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon dried marjoram', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 egg, beaten', '125g dried breadcrumbs']
